message.content:
cs.NI, cs.MA, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.OS

This paper presents a new approach for clock synchronization in wearables using standard system calls and skin electric potentials induced by powerline radiation. The paper focuses on the design and implementation of the synchronization approach and its evaluation using Arduino and TinyOS. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper involves signal processing and fusion techniques to solve the integer ambiguity problem, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.MA (Machine Learning) or cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also discusses the integration of the synchronization approach into wearable applications, which could place it in cs.IT (Information Theory) or cs.OS (Operating Systems).
